{{knowledge objective

|Title=Knowing the epidemiology of smoking among young people

Age of first cigarette

*Tobacco experimentation at 14 and daily consumption at 15.

question.title: Age of first cigarette
question.description: The age at which a young person first starts smoking tobacco products.

option_a.title: Tobacco experimentation at 14
option_a.description: The age at which a young person first starts experimenting with tobacco products.

option_b.title: Daily consumption at 15
option_b.description: The age at which a young person starts consuming tobacco products daily.

option_c.title: Tobacco experimentation at 14 and daily consumption at 15
option_c.description: The age range at which a young person first starts smoking tobacco products.

option_d.title: Daily consumption at 15
option_d.description: The age at which a young person starts consuming tobacco products daily.

correct_option.title: Daily consumption at 15
correct_option.description: The correct answer, which is the age at which a young person starts consuming tobacco products daily.
